Description: We are looking for a Cyber Security fresh graduate for a very interesting internship at KAUST.At the end of the internship.Threat Monitoring: Assist in monitoring security information and event management (SIEM) systems to detect and analyze potential security incidents.Incident Response: Participate in incident response activities to investigate and contain security breaches and cyber threats.Vulnerability Assessment: Support vulnerability assessments and penetration testing exercises to identify weaknesses in our information systems and network infrastructure.Security Awareness Training: Collaborate in the development and delivery of security awareness training for employees to promote a culture of cybersecurity awareness.Security Policy Compliance: Help ensure compliance with cybersecurity policies, procedures, and industry best practices.Security Tools Management: Assist in the management and maintenance of cybersecurity tools and technologies, such as firewalls, antivirus software, and intrusion detection systems.  the best candidates will have the chance to work a full-time job at KAUST with AcuativeME.Location: KAUST, 65KMs away from JeddahSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Cyber Security, software engineering, or any related field
At least 3 to 6 months of experience in cyber security or digital forensics or ethical hacking
Cybersecurity certifications are a plus
Good English command
